message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $92. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $87 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another counteroffer. Considering your last offer, I'm willing to come down to $91. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $88 for the product.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob! Considering your last offer, I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll come down to $89. It's a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
Thank you for your continued effort, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $87.50 for the product.

I'm still willing to work with you, Bob! Considering your last offer, I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll come down to $88.50. It's a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $88 for the product.
